column5: Anyone hear from the camp this year? I understand Danny and Sheri will not be there running things this year. Never got a deposit slip this year, called a week ago, they said they'd send another one, never got that either. Starting to wonder if our group should start looking at other options.

I don't know anything about this outfitter but I can tell you that I have had experiences like this in the past and every time I ended wishing that I had listen to my gut. If they can't take time to take your money what else won't they have to do?
On another board was told it's for sale.....not sure if it has any impact to your deposit...
Thanks - heard back from the owners, we're leaning toward giving it a shot, the location is perfect for where we want to fish. Going to keep our fingers crossed for sure!

I know the place sold not too long ago but do not know the new owners. That said, I've been to the camp plenty of times and do allot of my guiding in that area of the lake. The fishing is great along with the rest of LOTW.
